resources.string: You will need to place your inhaler according to the colored outline. The remaining doses will be detected using the camera.
Do not show this message again
After doing the inhalations, click on start to detect the remaining doses.
Confirm the remaining doses in your inhaler
Press Start and put the medication inside the colored square location
Please permit the app to access the camera and SD card, so we can save some photos for analysis
You need to provide both permission to advance, please try again!
